duties_responsibilities.duty: Help customers find the products they are looking for and provide assistance in various departments.
Ensure high quality products are available in produce, deli, bakery, dairy, meat, and other departments.
Pack ready-to-sell products in proper containers and stock displays.
Prepare and serve ready-to-eat food and assist customers in ordering cakes, fulfilling deli orders, or finding the right produce.
Keep the area clean, sanitized, and customer-ready.
Follow food safety standards and guidelines for maintaining quality and safety of food products.
